unnormalised: Entertainment News: Is Alia Bhatt hinting at baby no. 2?

unnormalised: Bollywood's grapevine is buzzing! Spotted leaving Lilavati Hospital at 14:30 hrs on 24/10/2024, Alia Bhatt's been sending fans into a frenzy. Is she pregnant again? Rumours started swirling after she was seen wearing a particularly roomy kurta, fueling speculation.
normalised: Bollywood's grapevine is buzzing! Spotted leaving Lilavati Hospital at fourteen thirty hours on twenty fourth October two thousand and twenty four, Alia Bhatt's been sending fans into a frenzy. Is she pregnant again? Rumors started swirling after she was seen wearing a particularly roomy kurta, fueling speculation.

unnormalised: Remember how she and Ranbir Kapoor announced Raha's arrival back in 2022? Fans are eagerly awaiting a similar announcement. Sources close to the Kapoor khandaan are tight-lipped, but that hasn't stopped Twitter from going into overdrive.
normalised: Remember how she and Ranbir Kapoor announced Raha's arrival back in two thousand and twenty two? Fans are eagerly awaiting a similar announcement. Sources close to the Kapoor khandaan are tight-lipped, but that hasn't stopped Twitter from going into overdrive.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Ranbir was seen at the Ambani's Diwali bash on 26/10/2024 looking dashing in a Manish Malhotra creation. Alia was noticeably absent, adding further fuel to the fire.
normalised: Meanwhile, Ranbir was seen at the Ambani's Diwali bash on twenty sixth October two thousand and twenty four looking dashing in a Manish Malhotra creation. Alia was noticeably absent, adding further fuel to the fire.

unnormalised: Insiders claim that Alia is taking it easy, focusing on family, and enjoying yummy "ghar ka khana" prepared by her mom Soni Razdan. We’ll keep you updated on any official confirmations! Stay tuned for updates – maybe before the clock strikes 00:00 on 27/10/2024!
